law.catch_line: The purposes of this section are to:...

text.section:
The purposes of this section are to:
carry out the purposes of the laws relating to motor vehicle licensing and motor vehicle fuel taxes; and
prevent diversions of revenues that those laws generate.

In a budget bill, the Governor may use the revenues that are generated by motor vehicle licensing and by motor vehicle fuel taxes, including fines and penalties, only to:
construct, reconstruct, and maintain bridges, highways, roads, and streets;
pay the interest on and principal of bonds that have been issued to finance the construction of bridges, highways, roads, and streets; or
enforce those laws.
